description:
"Galcon is a must. It's what you might call 'Space Risk In Real-Time.'" - Penny Arcade

"Galcon offers fast-paced gameplay - just the thing for a quick bus journey but with solid enough strategy element to keep you coming back." - Kotaku

"Galcon had me hooked at the first game." - touchArcade

Galcon won the "Innovation in Game Design" IGFM Award

*** Also featuring ONLINE MULTI-PLAYER Action!!! ***

Galcon is an awesome high-paced multi-player galactic action-strategy game.  Send swarms of ships to defeat enemy planets and conquer the universe!

-Online multi-player game (local and internet-wide) lets you battle 1000's of players worldwide!

-Rankings for all online players at Galcon.com!

-Plus five diverse single-player missions!

-Includes color-blind mode.
